name: ComfortMeasures
title: Comfort Measures
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent care regimes used to define comfort measure care.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Intervention. The intent of this data element is to identify patients receiving comfort measure care.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with SNOMED CT regime and therapy codes for comfort measures, terminal care, dying care and hospice care.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude diagnosis codes that identify patients with Palliative Care.)
